Title: Relates to amending provisions requiring the termination of connected vehicle services upon the request of a domestic violence victim
Summary: Amends certain provisions requiring the termination of connected vehicle services upon the request of a domestic violence victim; requires the provider of the connected vehicle services to terminate such services within two days of receiving a request; directs the office for the prevention of domestic violence to make information available on their website; defines terms.
LawCode: Amd §399-ccccc, Gen Bus L; amd §2, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.9174-B & A.9616-C)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to connected vehicle service and domestic violence victims; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the general business law relating to remote vehicle technology and domestic violence victims, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 9174-B and A. 9616-C, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
